title: Caroline Ansell – 2022 Comments on Penny Mordaunt Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Caroline Ansell, the Conservative MP for Eastbourne and Willingdon, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content: Hoping Penny Mordaunt will once again put herself forward to lead our Party and Country. She has the qualities and qualifications. #PM4PM
